titleStmt.title: SII 7.445: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 445. (A.R. No. 231 of 1901). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . vikkiramacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu nālāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattup palakunṟakkoṭṭattuc ceṅkunṟanāṭṭuk kalavaiyāna rājanārāyaṇacaturvvetimaṅkalattu Uṭaiyār tirukkāriśvaramuṭaiyāṟku tiruvarddhayāmattukku nittaniman=tañ ceyya perumpāṇappāṭi
karaivaḻi Īccūrnāṭṭu meṟṟeri lirukkum Araiyan tevanen Itdevaṟku tiruvamurtupaṭikku Arici nānāḻikku nelluk kuṟuṇi yirunāḻiyum kaṟiyamurtu Iraṇṭukku nellu Irunāḻiyum Ūrarumoḻitevanmarakkālā linnelluk kuṟuṇi nānāḻiyum celvatāka nān koṇṭu viṭṭa bhūmiyāvatu rā janārāyaṇaviḷākattu kiḻkūṟṟu
tirucciṟṟampalavatikkuk kiḻakku śrīrājarājavākkālukku vaṭakku munṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟ ṟañcām catirattu bhāradvāji jātavedabhaṭṭanpakkal nān Iṟai Iḻicci koṇṭu viṭṭa nilam kiḻpāṟkellai bhāradvāji cipontaibhaṭṭanukku meṟku tenpāṟkellai kaṇṇāṟṟukku vaṭakku melpāṟkellai catiravaṟitirkku kiḻakku vaṭapāṟkel
lai kaṇṇāṟṟukkut teṟku Innāṟpāṟkellaiyuḷ naṭuvupaṭṭa kuḻi Aiññūṟum mikutikkuṟai vuḷḷaṭaṅkavum kauśikan tirukkāribhaṭṭanum gautaman ciperantaināyakabhaṭṭanum bhārggavan tillaināyakabhaṭṭanu muḷḷiṭṭa Ikkoyilil civapbrāhmaṇarpakkal nān sandhiviḷakku Iraṇṭukku poliyūṭṭāka kuṭutta pon mu
kkālum neyyamurtu tayiramurtukkuc cāvā muvāp perumāṭāka viṭṭa pacu Iraṇṭu Ippaṭi koṇṭu viṭṭen Araiyan tevanen Itdharmmam cantrātittavarai panmahāyeścara rakṣai Ippaṭikku Ivai cipon=taicaṅkaṉāna Ulakaḷan=ta coḻavācāriyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.445 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
